catalogue_raissonne: Murase, Art through a Lifetime, no. 477
creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: colorful images of religious figures and noble people gathered within shrine buildings; a group of spectators watches a dragon with fish head rising out of water; man on floor of building near end with red ogre standing over him; same monk appears throughout; interspersed with text
medium: Ink printed on paper with hand-applied color
portfolio: From Illustrations of the Life and Deeds of the Grand Master of Mount Kōya (Kōya Daishi gyōjō zuga 高野大師行状図画)
title: Illustrations of the Life and Deeds of the Grand Master of Mount Kōya, vol. 8
